text: Pope Leo may mean: *Pope Leo I Leo the Great (440–461) *Pope Leo II (682–683) *Pope Leo III (795–816) *Pope Leo IV (847–855) *Pope Leo V (903) *Pope Leo VI (928) *Pope Leo VII (936–939) *Pope Leo VIII (964–965) *Pope Leo IX (1049–1054) *Pope Leo X (1513–1521) *Pope Leo XI (1605) *Pope Leo XII (1823–1829) *Pope Leo XIII (1878–1903) *Pope Leo XIV (2025–present) Leo
title: Pope Leo
